member.name: T:Microsoft.Hadoop.Client.JobStatusCode
member.summary: Enum for the possible jobDetails states. These values are tied/sourced from Tempelton. DO NOT UPDATE/CHANGE unless the values returned from Tempelton have changed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hadoop.Client.JobStatusCode.Unknown
member.summary: Indicates the jobDetails is running.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hadoop.Client.JobStatusCode.Running
member.summary: Indicates the jobDetails is running.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hadoop.Client.JobStatusCode.Completed
member.summary: Indicates the jobDetails has completed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hadoop.Client.JobStatusCode.Failed
member.summary: Indicates that the jobDetails has failed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hadoop.Client.JobStatusCode.Initializing
member.summary: Indicates that the job is in an unknown state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hadoop.Client.JobStatusCode.Canceled
member.summary: Indicates that the jobDetails is canceled.

member.summary: Writes the content of a stream to a file on the storage system.

member.returns: A task object that can be awaited.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hadoop.Client.Storage.IStorageAbstraction.Read(System.Uri)
member.summary: Reads the content of a file on the storage system into a stream.
member.returns: A task object that can be awaited. The result is a stream containing the content of the file on the storage system.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hadoop.Client.Storage.IStorageAbstraction.List(System.Uri,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lists the contents of a given path on the storage system.
member.param: A flag indicating if the traversal should be recursive.
member.returns: A task object that can be awaited. The result is the list of files located under the given path on the storage system.
